---
title: "tiny dists"
author: "Brian Masinde (brima748)"
date: "3/2/2020"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r}
set.seed(2020)
gauss <- rnorm(100, mean = 0 , sd = 1)
unif <- runif(100, min = 0.5, max = 1)
beta <- rbeta(100, shape1 = 0.5, shape2 = 0.5)
beta2 <- rbeta(100, 2, 5)

par(mfrow = c(2,2))

plot(density(gauss), main = "X1", xlab = " ")
plot(density(unif), main = "X2", xlab = " ")
plot(density(beta), main = "X3", xlab = " ", xlim = c(0,1))
plot(density(beta2), main = "X4", xlab = " ", xlim = c(0,0.8))
```
